name: wicked-coolkit-user
description: A fun, nostalgic web toolkit built on Heroku and Salesforce.

scripts.build: npm run build:vendor && if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run build:assets || echo 'Not building assets'
scripts.build:assets: npm run clean && npm run build:js && npm run build:css
scripts.build:css: for file in public/resources/*.css; do cat $file | postcss > ${file%.*}.min.css; done
scripts.build:js: for file in public/resources/*.js; do terser $file --compress --mangle -o ${file%.*}.min.js; done
